column1: Is there anything else you want to communicate that will ensure a smooth transition for this client on their CEM journey?
Close-out and transition details: To ensure a seamless transition, it is essential to maintain open and transparent communication channels throughout the process. Regular status updates, proactive issue escalation, and a collaborative approach will be crucial in addressing any potential roadblocks. Furthermore, IBM will provide comprehensive documentation and knowledge transfer to empower the client's teams, enabling them to effectively manage and optimize their CEM journey.
